idea-plugin.name: Base16 Decaf
idea-plugin.vendor: Alex Mirrington (https://github.com/alexmirrington), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Decaf for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Alex Mirrington (https://github.com/alexmirrington). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
